heroSection.title:
Own your
relationships
with your
fans. [VARIANT1]
heroSection.description: Create links and landing pages that direct fans to listen to your music in the right service, save your music, pre-save, follow, subscribe, buy tickets, enter a contest or connect it all together in your Artist Bio Link.

title.desktop: Maintain all of your fan contacts

description.desktop: Easily manage all of your fan contacts, collected in an intuitive fan database to keep control of fan contact info, activity and demographics.

title.desktop: Use Smart Audiences to narrow down your fans

description.desktop: Feature.fm automatically groups your fans into lists like super fans, influencers, and Spotify users based on their attributes.

title.desktop: Sync fan contacts to your email platform

description.desktop: Sync your fan emails to your preferred email platform like Mailchimp and ActiveCampaign to communicate to your growing fanbase.

title.desktop: Collect fan contact info across all of your links and landing pages

description.desktop: Encourage fans to share their contact information and subscribe to your email list through any of your links and landing pages with Feature.fmâ€™s email collection tools.

youShouldAlsoCheckOut.title: Two more things you should check out

description.desktop: Become a better music marketer by understanding fan behaviors and preferences across all of your marketing activities. Measure fan interactions, from visits to conversions, and break out data for deeper analysis.
Create links and landing pages for everything you need to promote as an artist.
You can use Feature.fm for free or subscribe to one of our paid plans. All paid plans come with a free trial of our Pro plan
